attributes.action: Give the Lord Mayor of Birmingham 'Right Honourable' status.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Give the Lord Mayor of Birmingham 'Right Honourable' status.

London, York, Edinburgh, Glasgow, Belfast and Cardiff have 'Right Honourable' Lord Mayors, this is the Premier League, so to speak. Because Birmingham only has a 'Right Worshipful' Lord Mayors, Brum is kept down in the first division. 

Lord Mayors are ceremonial and symbolic. However, Birmingham is the second city of the UK and furthermore, through its regeneration, the people of Birmingham aspire for their city to be equal to any in the United Kingdom or beyond. 

So Prime Minister, give the Lord Mayor of Brum 'Right Honourable' status.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours for all enquiries reagrding nominations.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
